div.head: 產門不合
div.div: failure of the birth gate to close

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the birth gate to close

sense.def: Alternative Names chan men bu bi 產門不閉 ; chan hou yin bu neng he 產後陰不能合 , the yin [gate] is unable to close following delivery; chan hou yin fan 產後陰翻 , yin [gate] turning inside out following delivery. Pathological Condition with the birth canal remaining wide open after delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 (Yin bing 陰病 ): 產門不合，石灰，炒熱，淬水洗 ,“If the birth gate fails to close , roast shi hui until it is hot, put it into water and use this to rinse [the yin gate]”.
